title: Tiresias

metadata.description: Text extract from chapter “Tiresias” of Book III of the « Metamorphosis » of Ovid from which has inspired the painter René-Antoine HOUASSE for the making of his painting “Minerva and Tiresias”
metadata.keywords: Château de Versailles, Palais of Versailles, Versailles, Louis the 14th, Louis 14, Louis XIV, Ovid, The Metamorphosis, The Grand Trianon, Grand Trianon, Trianon, Tiresias, Minerva, Minerva and Tiresias, Minerve et Tiresias, René-Antoine HOUASSE
metadata.image_legend: Minerve at first ground makes Tiresias in the center becoming blind

specialty: French Painting of the Seventeenth century
French Painting of the XVIIth century
